message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DB 

This paper deals with the embedding of entities and categories into a semantic space, which is a common topic in natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR), falling under the sub-categories of cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The paper also utilizes structured knowledge and taxonomy hierarchy, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), making cs.AI a likely sub-category as well. The framework proposed in the paper involves computing semantic relatedness, which is a task commonly tackled in the field of machine learning and data mining (cs.LG). Finally, the paper deals with dataless hierarchical classification, which is a sub-topic of database systems (cs.DB).
